name: BENEATH the RUST (bevy)
description:
You are FASCINATED by complex systems. But this one is special. It's more nuanced and more... attractive? Keep exploring to discover the truth; no only about "the system", but also about yourself.

Remake using Bevy Engine (in Rust) of BENEATH the SURFACE: the game I developed for the 29th edition of Ludum Dare.

Controls
Move with left/right arrows. Jump with space or up arrow.
